import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' function Modal(props) { const multipleFunc = () => { props.openModal() props.addItem() window.location.reload() } return (
×
) } Modal.propTypes = { modalState: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, openModal: PropTypes.func.isRequired, addItem: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onHandleChange: PropTypes.func.isRequired, multipleFunc: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default Modal
